data.title: Hurley a free woman after divorce granted
data.meta_description: Shane Warne's girlfriend Elizabeth Hurley is officially a free woman with the London High Court granting he...
data.text:
Shane Warne's girlfriend Elizabeth Hurley is officially a free woman with the London High Court granting her and her ex-husband a divorce.

Hurley said her four-year marriage with Indian textile millionaire Arun Nayar broke down due to his "unreasonable behaviour," court documents show, The Sun newspaper reports.

Hurley, 46, married Nayar at Sudley Castle in Gloucestershire, south-west of London, in March 2007 before a traditional Hindu wedding in India.

The London-based actress has been dating Australian cricketer Warne, 41, since around December, when the pair were photographed together at a party.

Hurley announced she was separated from Nayar via Twitter after the photos became public.

Her relationship with Warne has been on-and-off. Hurley visited the cricket legend at his $10 million Melbourne mansion in February, but then reports surfaced that Warne slept with a porn star and was sending raunchy texts to another women during their courtship.

Rumours the pair are back together were sparked after they were photographed having dinner together in a Los Angeles in late March.

The couple were then photographed kissing at a cricket match in Mumbai India where Warne was playing in the Indian Premier League in May.
